channel.title: What do you think will happen if runescape closes down?
channel.description: will that be the end of rsps? because there some games already that made runescape crap

item.title: What do you think will happen if runescape closes down?
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

deathscapepkz:

when runescape dies so will rsps probably after about a year because rsps get boring after awhile

Not necessarily, all the players from Runescape would be drawn to rsps to have something to play and that would create more profit for game owners and would most likely result in the creation of new content and updates.

Read full topic

item.title: What do you think will happen if runescape closes down?
item.dc:creator: @Pluvia Pluvia
item.description:
@Pluvia wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]RSPS will not end, as long as there is a desire to play the game.

Most content in RuneScape was in Private Servers before JaGeX did it, they only did a ‘better’ job at it, as they have professional teams working together.

There are hundreds of amazing client ‘hackers’ out there, such as SWAT, Galkon, and Bluur.
There are also many wonderful modelers, and content developers (Programmers).

If they wanted to, they could rebuild custom caches, in there own way, and modify clients to read them how they wanted, thus progressing Private Servers past RuneScape’s descent.

Sure, they may never be anywhere as big as RuneScape, or as stable, but it will never die as long as there is a desire for the game play.[/quote]
If only I could rep you for that.

Read full topic
item.source: What do you think will happen if runescape closes down?

item.title: What do you think will happen if runescape closes down?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:14, topic:370983”][quote author=Sinto link=topic=467075.msg3415529#msg3415529 date=1291030238]
RS won’t shut down for years…
[/quote]u dont know that
what if jagex burns to the ground along with everyone who works there
Wait a minute! then they have to ask us to code runescape

AWESOME[/quote]

No… To bad the servers that run runescape are all around the world in different data centers. Why do you think certain worlds have less of a ping? Because the ones with lower ping are closer to you then the ones with higher ping. Jagex won’t burn down with all the people in it… it just can’t happen…

Read full topic

item.title: What do you think will happen if runescape closes down?
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:10, topic:370983”][quote author=Scape-JAVA link=topic=467075.msg3415381#msg3415381 date=1291001191]

kind of sort of. no new versions of rsps. we will still have everything up to the date it closed down though

but ps wont hold a lot of people (if you have ha populer server)
[/quote]i’ve seen some servers that were holding 3000+ people just fine. no single server will get much more popular than that.

if your wondering what server, i think it was oceanscape or w/e

Too bad the RS2 client only supports 2048 players.

You got him there. But in programming terms, why?[/quote]

I think because it’ll crash, correct me if I’m wrong, but isn’t this in the RS2 client.

maxPlayers = 2048; playerArray = new Player[maxPlayers];

Read full topic
